languages.text: "Хм... для вытачивания формы он использует свое проклятие — псайкерские силы. Поразительно легкомысленное применение варп-сил".
"Hmm... he carves his works using the psyker abilities he is cursed with. An astonishingly frivolous application of warp powers."
languages.original_text: "Хм... для вытачивания формы он использует свое проклятие — псайкерские силы. Поразительно легкомысленное применение варп-сил".

traits.locale_text: "Hmm... he carves his moulds using the psyker powers he is cursed with. An astonishingly frivolous application of warp powers."

languages.text: "Hmm ... er formt seine Werke mit den Psioniker-Fähigkeiten, mit denen er verflucht ist. Eine erstaunlich unseriöse Anwendung von Warpkräften."
languages.original_text: "Hmm... he carves his works using the psyker abilities he is cursed with. An astonishingly frivolous application of warp powers."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm ... er formt seine Werke mit den Psioniker-Fähigkeiten, mit denen er verflucht ist. Eine erstaunlich unseriöse Anwendung von Warpkräften."

languages.text: « Hmm... Il façonne ses œuvres à l'aide des capacités de psyker qu'il a le malheur de posséder. Voilà un usage incroyablement frivole des pouvoirs du Warp. »
languages.original_text: "Hmm... he carves his works using the psyker abilities he is cursed with. An astonishingly frivolous application of warp powers."

traits.locale_text: « Hmm... Il façonne ses œuvres à l'aide des capacités de psyker qu'il a le malheur de posséder. Voilà un usage incroyablement frivole des pouvoirs du Warp. »

languages.text: “嗯……他在用被诅咒的灵能能力雕刻他的作品。以这种方式运用亚空间的力量，着实是太过轻率了。”
languages.original_text: "Hmm... he carves his works using the psyker abilities he is cursed with. An astonishingly frivolous application of warp powers."

traits.locale_text: “嗯……他在用被诅咒的灵能能力雕刻他的作品。以这种方式运用亚空间的力量，着实是太过轻率了。”

languages.text: «Mmm... esculpe sus obras con sus maldiciones psíquicas. Es una aplicación extremadamente frívola de los poderes de la disformidad».
languages.original_text: "Hmm... he carves his works using the psyker abilities he is cursed with. An astonishingly frivolous application of warp powers."

traits.locale_text: «Mmm... esculpe sus obras con sus maldiciones psíquicas. Es una aplicación extremadamente frívola de los poderes de la disformidad».

languages.text: 「ふむ…彼は呪われた異能者の力を用いて彫刻しているというわけか。なんとも馬鹿げた〈歪み〉の力の使い方よ」
languages.original_text: "Hmm... he carves his works using the psyker abilities he is cursed with. An astonishingly frivolous application of warp powers."

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ…彼は呪われた異能者の力を用いて彫刻しているというわけか。なんとも馬鹿げた〈歪み〉の力の使い方よ」

languages.text: "Hım... Eserlerini, kendine musallat ruhsezer kabiliyetlerini çarçur ederek yontuyor. Öteboyut nimetini böyle hovardaca harcamak akıl kârı değil."
languages.original_text: "Hmm... he carves his works using the psyker abilities he is cursed with. An astonishingly frivolous application of warp powers."
